name: Game Edukasi Mitigasi Bencana Tanah Longsor KKN
name_original: Game Edukasi Mitigasi Bencana Tanah Longsor KKN
description:
Game Edukasi Mitigasi Bencana Tanah Longsor KKN is an educational puzzle game developed by nandaradianto. It was originally released in 2021.
Game Edukasi Mitigasi Bencana Tanah Longsor KKN is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
